description:
Blockchain Invest Platform (BIP) – is a platform that brings together investors and promising projects in a blockchain ecosystem to accumulate funds, investment, implementation of these projects and distribution of profits.

The Blockchain Invest Platform will include companies that are focused on making a profit for the platform participants using blockchain technologies that provide full transparency of all investment and technological processes.

BIP has its own token, BIP, which corresponds to the dynamics of the company's development.
name: BlockchainInvestPlatform
